description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=0/3, Sex=3/3, Mature Content=0/3. Welcome to Puzzled !!! A place filled with interesting animated puzzles and a sassy shop assistant who likes to dress up for charity and let you take pictures! All done in the inevitable Ingeniousfun style!
